Package utils

Class NetworkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.NetworkManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class NetworkManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    The NetworkManager enables multiple networks with the same participants to be managed.

        public dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.network.Network createExtraNetwork​(java.lang.String caller)

        Parameters:
        caller - former debugging string in approach to track network data

      • getLoggedValues

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long> getLoggedValues()
